MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:29pm. Our team have encountered delays arriving to site and we are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:37pm on Saturday 12th December 2020
